name: CloudTest-Cloud java unit test framework
short_description: CloudTest is a redefined unit testing approach and methodology, which can make your testing jobs become much more easy and efficient. It is a pure java lightweight framework integrated test cases management, test data management, assert management, automation regression, performance monitor and test report in one.
summary: A redefined framework with new approach and methodology for unit test

license.fullpath: License :: OSI-Approved Open Source :: Apache License V2.0
